about.title: Engineering as a service
about.subtitle: Agile as a culture.
about.text: Squadreon is a software development studio established in 2020 by the initiative of independent developers and engineers motivated to team up, keeping our freelance spirit with each project as a new quest to jump into.
about.agile-squads-text: Autonomous, self-organized teams that covers all the aspect of the development process of the project.
about.tailored-text: Squads are built specifically to suit your project needs. You can cherry-pick each team member.
about.autonomous-text: Squads are autonomous and experienced in agile methodologies and can join your organizationâ€™s existing tribes and guilds.
about.flexible-text: Workflow can be reduced or increased depending on the project needs. No fixed cost, only worked hours are invoiced.
about.mature-text: Cohesive teams of consultants with proven experience working together.
